# Change Management Checklist

This checklist is tailored for the **Change Management Lead** to assess impact, plan communications, ensure training readiness, define rollback procedures, and obtain stakeholder sign-off for process or organizational changes.

---

## Change Overview
- **Change title/description:** _____________________
- **Change Management Lead:** _____________________
- **Change sponsor:** _____________________
- **Proposed implementation date:** _____________________
- **Change type:** [ ] Process [ ] Role/Org [ ] Tool/System [ ] Policy [ ] Other: _____

---

## 1. Impact Assessment

### Scope
- [ ] Identified all teams, roles, and individuals affected by this change
- [ ] Assessed impact level: [ ] Low [ ] Medium [ ] High

**Affected groups:**
- Group 1: _____________________ (Impact: ______)
- Group 2: _____________________ (Impact: ______)
- Group 3: _____________________ (Impact: ______)

### Risk Analysis
- [ ] Identified potential risks or resistance points
- [ ] Documented mitigation strategies for each risk

**Key risks:**
1. _____________________________________________________
   - Mitigation: _____________________________________________________
2. _____________________________________________________
   - Mitigation: _____________________________________________________

### Dependencies
- [ ] Identified dependencies on other initiatives, teams, or systems
- [ ] Coordinated with dependency owners

**Dependencies:**
- Dependency 1: _____________________
- Dependency 2: _____________________

**Notes:**
_Document any additional impact considerations._

---

## 2. Communications Plan

### Messaging
- [ ] Drafted change announcement explaining "why," "what," "when," and "how"
- [ ] Tailored messaging for different audiences (leadership, teams, external stakeholders)
- [ ] Reviewed messaging with change sponsor

**Key messages:**
- **Why this change:** _____________________________________________________
- **What is changing:** _____________________________________________________
- **When it takes effect:** _____________________________________________________
- **How it affects users:** _____________________________________________________

### Communication Timeline
- [ ] Pre-announcement (awareness): _____________________ (Date)
- [ ] Official announcement: _____________________ (Date)
- [ ] Reminder/check-in: _____________________ (Date)
- [ ] Post-implementation follow-up: _____________________ (Date)

### Communication Channels
- [ ] Email
- [ ] Team meetings / town halls
- [ ] Slack/Teams
- [ ] Documentation updates
- [ ] Training sessions
- [ ] Other: _____________________

**Notes:**
_Link to communication materials or note any special considerations._

---

## 3. Training and Support

### Training Plan
- [ ] Identified training needs for affected groups
- [ ] Developed or updated training materials
- [ ] Scheduled training sessions or made self-paced materials available

**Training details:**
- **Audience:** _____________________
- **Format:** (e.g., live workshop, recorded video, documentation)
- **Delivery date(s):** _____________________
- **Trainer/owner:** _____________________

### Ongoing Support
- [ ] Established support channel (e.g., dedicated Slack channel, office hours, FAQ)
- [ ] Identified change champions or subject matter experts to assist teams
- [ ] Planned check-ins to address questions and feedback

**Support resources:**
- Support channel: _____________________
- Change champions: _____________________
- FAQ or help documentation: _____________________

**Notes:**
_Document any additional support considerations._

---

## 4. Rollback Plan

- [ ] Defined rollback criteria (conditions under which the change would be reversed)
- [ ] Documented rollback procedure
- [ ] Identified rollback owner and decision-maker
- [ ] Tested rollback process (if applicable)

**Rollback criteria:**
- _____________________________________________________
- _____________________________________________________

**Rollback procedure:**
1. _____________________________________________________
2. _____________________________________________________
3. _____________________________________________________

**Rollback owner:** _____________________

**Notes:**
_Describe any limitations or risks associated with rollback._

---

## 5. Stakeholder Sign-Off

- [ ] Obtained sign-off from change sponsor
- [ ] Obtained sign-off from key stakeholders (list below)
- [ ] Documented any conditions or concerns raised

- [ ] Scheduled post-implementation review date: _____________________
- [ ] Defined success criteria and KPIs to measure effectiveness
- [ ] Assigned owner for tracking and reporting outcomes

1. _____________________________________________________
2. _____________________________________________________

**KPIs / Metrics:**
- Metric 1: _____________________________________________________
- Metric 2: _____________________________________________________

**Review owner:** _____________________

**Notes:**
_Document any follow-up actions or continuous improvement plans._
